msContents.summary: Qerǝllos, ቄርሎስ:, Theological and Christological Works of Cyril of Alexandria and other church fathers, cf. EMML 4448.Ff. i r(ecto)-v(recto): Excerpt from the Synaxarium on the life of Cyril. F–46v: On the Orthodox Faith (De recta fide), Bä’ntä Haymanot Rǝt‘ǝt, addressed to Emperor Theodosius. Bernd Manuel Weischer, Qerellos I (= Afrikanische Forschungen 7) Hamburg 1973. F–xxx: That Christ is One, Kama aḥadu Krestos, by Cyril of Alexandria. Bernd Manuel Weischer, Qerellos III: Der Dialog “Dass Christus einer ist” des Kyrillos von Alexandrien (Äthiopistiche Forschungen, Vol. 2) Wiesbaden 1977. F-73r: Homily by Theodotus of Ancyra, Weicher, ibid. 122–33 F-73v: Homily by Severus of Synnada, Weischer, ibid. 62–7. F–74v: Homily by Acacius of Melitene, Weischer, ibid. 68–81. F-75v: Homily by Juvenalius of Jerusalem, Weischer, ibid. 82–7. F-76v: Homily by Cyril of Alexandria, Weicher, ibid. 88–99. F-77r: Homily by Rheginus of Constantinople, Weicher, ibid. 100–7. F-78r: Homily by Cyril of Alexandria, Weicher, ibid. 108–17. F: Homily by Eusiebius of Heraclea, Weicher, ibid. 117–21. F-79v: Homily by Theodotus of Ancyra, Weicher, ibid. 122–33. F: Homily by Firmus of Caesarea, Weicher, ibid. 134–137. F-80r: Epistle of the Synod of Ephesus to John of Antioch, Weicher, ibid. 138–141. F: Homily by Cyril of Alexandria, Weicher, ibid. 142–145. F-81r: Epistle of John of Antioch to Cyril of Alexandria, Weicher, ibid. 146–153. F-82v: Epistle of Cyril of Alexandria to John of Antioch, Weicher, ibid. 153–169. F-84v: Homily by Epiphanius of Cyprus. Bernd Manuel Weischer, Qerellos IV 2: Traktate des Epiphanius von Zypern und des Proklos von Kyzikos. AF 6 (Wiesbaden, 1979) 24–47. F-85r: Homily by Epiphanius of Cyprus on the Trinity, Weicher, ibid. 52–58. F-87r: Homily by Proclus of Cyzicus, Weicher, ibid. 64–87. F-90v: Homily by Severianus of Gabala. Bernd Manuel Weischer, Qerellos IV 3: Traktate des Severianos Von Gabala, Gregorios Thaumaturgus und Kyrillos von Alexandrien. AF 7 (Wiesbaden, 1980) 22–67. F-91r: The Faith of Gregory Thaumaturgus, Weischer, ibid. 70–77. F-92v: The first homily of Cyril of Alexandria on Melchisedec, Weischer, ibid. 82–97. F-94r: The second homily of Cyril of Alexandria on Melchisedec, Weischer, ibid. 98–117. F: Homily by a Sage on Melchisedec. Bernd Manuel Weischer, “Die äthiopischen Psalmen- und Qerlosfragmente in Evevan/Armenien,” Oreiens Christianus 53 (1969) 142–143. F: On the 318 Orthodox Fathers, Weischer, ibid. 143–144. F-95r: On the Nativity and Life of Our Lord, Weischer, ibid. 144–145. F: Confession of faith, Weischer, ibid, 146. F-96r: Closing prayer, mentioning the owner, but erased. Closing scribal note mentioning the day the book was started (the 12th night of Ṭərr) and completed on a Friday in Mäggabit.
